# 06-01-2026 : Mr. R. S. Meena, Member of the Uttarakhand Human Rights Commission, paid a courtesy call on the Governor.

Publish Date :January 6, 2026

The Hon’ble Governor of Uttarakhand, Lieutenant General Gurmit Singh (Retd.), was paid a courtesy visit on Tuesday at Lok Bhavan by Shri R. S. Meena and Shri Girdhar Singh Dharmshaktu, Members of the Uttarakhand Human Rights Commission.During the meeting, discussions were held on matters related to the functioning of the Commission, as well as various issues concerning the protection and promotion of human rights in the State..……0…….

The Hon’ble Governor of Uttarakhand, Lieutenant General Gurmit Singh (Retd.), was paid a courtesy visit on Tuesday at Lok Bhavan by Shri R. S. Meena and Shri Girdhar Singh Dharmshaktu, Members of the Uttarakhand Human Rights Commission.

During the meeting, discussions were held on matters related to the functioning of the Commission, as well as various issues concerning the protection and promotion of human rights in the State..……0…….
